g.text: Wang et al. Climate Change From a Distance
the ﬁgures. SW, MH, ZL, IW, and CL all contributed to designing
the studies, interpreting the ﬁndings, and editing the manuscript.
This research was facilitated by a grant from the Climate
Adaptation Flagship of the Commonwealth Scientiﬁc and
Industrial Research Organisation of Australia awarded to
MH and IW, and an Endeavour Postgraduate Scholarship
